cves.description: In the Airoha Bluetooth audio SDK, there is a possible unauthorized access to the RACE protocol. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

affected.product: AB156x, AB157x, AB158x, AB159x series, AB1627

versions.version: Airoha IoT SDK for BT audio v5.5.0 and earlier
Airoha AB1561x/AB1562x/AB1563x SDK v3.3.1 and earlier

problemType: CWE-306 Missing Authentication for Critical Function

cves.description: In the Airoha Bluetooth audio SDK, there is a possible way to pair Bluetooth audio device without user consent. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

versions.version: Airoha IoT SDK for BT audio v5.5.0 and earlier
Airoha AB1561x/AB1562x/AB1563x SDK v3.3.1 and earlier

cves.description: In the Airoha Bluetooth audio SDK, there is a possible permission bypass that allows access critical data of RACE protocol through Bluetooth LE GATT service. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

affected.product: AB156x, AB157x, AB158x, AB159x series, AB1627

versions.version: Airoha IoT SDK for BT audio v5.5.0 and earlier
Airoha AB1561x/AB1562x/AB1563x SDK v3.3.1 and earlier

problemType: CWE-306 Missing Authentication for Critical Function
